All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArmorBooster
Upgrades Player's armor.
Barrel
Barrel.
Booster
This class is common for all boosters in the game.
Button
This class is common for all buttons.
ChoosingStage
Singleton class which represents the "Choosing stage" of the "Editor mode", where entity for the "Creation stage" can be chosen.
Coin
Coin.
CommonRoom
Common room.
Constants
Class for constants.
Constants.Boxes
Represents touchBox/hitBox/AttackBox type.
Constants.ButtonTypes
Represents all types of buttons of the game UI (except editor choosing buttons).
Constants.CreatureStates
Represents states of the creature.
Constants.Directions
Represents all possible directions.
Constants.EditStages
Represents stages of the Editor.
Constants.EnemyConstants
 
Constants.EnemyConstants.KnightConstants
 
Constants.EnemyConstants.SpearmanConstants
 
Constants.Entities
Represents objects, which can be added to room in Editor mode.
Constants.ItemsConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.ArmorBoosterConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.CoinConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.DamageBoosterConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.HealPotionConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.HealthBoosterConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.KeyConstants
 
Constants.ItemsConstants.SpeedBoosterConstants
 
Constants.ItemTypes
Represents all items in the game.
Constants.ObstacleConstants
 
Constants.PlayerConstants
 
Constants.RoomConstants
 
Constants.RoomTypes
Represents all room types.
Constants.StatesEnum
Represents all possible game states.
Constants.UIConstants
 
Constants.UIConstants.EditorConstants
 
Constants.UIConstants.MenuConstants
 
Constants.UIConstants.PlayConstants
 
Constants.UIConstants.SelectionConstants
 
Constants.WindowConstants
 
CreationStage
Singleton class which represents the "Creation stage" of the "Editor mode", where rooms/enemies/obstacles can be created/deleted.
Creature
This class is common for all creatures in the game.
DamageBooster
Upgrades Player's damage.
DeathScreen
Singleton class which represents a screen shown after player's death.
DeathScreenMenuButton
Button on the Death screen.
DestroyableObstacle
This class is common for all destroyable obstacles, which can appear in the room.
Editor
Singleton class which represents the "Editor mode", where level can be created and saved.
EditorBackButton
Button in the "Saving stage" of the "Editor mode".
EditorChooseButton
Button in the "Choosing stage" of the "Editor mode".
EditorSaveButton
Button in the "Saving stage" of the "Editor mode".
Enemy
This class is common for all enemies in the game.
EnemyManager
Singleton class, which controls all enemies in the room.
FinalRoom
Final room.
Game
Singleton class for starting render and update loop and controlling current state of the game.
GamePanel
Uses JPanel for drawing on GameWindow.
GameState
The GameState interface should be implemented by all classes which represent game states.
GameWindow
Uses JFrame for creating GUI window.
HealPotion
Heal potion.
HealthBooster
Upgrades Player's max health.
HelpMethods
Contains useful static methods.
Images
Class for loading all game images.
Item
This class is common for all items in the game.
Key
Key.
KeyboardInput
Reads inputs from keyboard.
Knight
Second type of enemies.
Level
Level of the game.
LoadSave
Class for working with files.
Main
Main class where game is started.
Menu
Singleton class which represents start game state, from which other game states can be reached.
MenuButton
This class is common for all buttons in the Menu.
MenuEditorButton
Button in the Menu.
MenuExitButton
Button in the Menu.
MenuPlayButton
Button in the Menu.
MouseInput
Reads inputs from mouse.
MyLogger
Wrapper class for log4j2 logger.
Obstacle
This class is common for all obstacles, which can appear in the room.
Play
Singleton class which represents state where game is played.
Player
Class for character under the Player's control.
Renderer
Singleton runnable class for rendering all game elements.
Room
This class is common for all types of the rooms in the game.
SavingStage
Singleton class which represents the "Saving stage" of the "Editor mode", where created level can be saved to the file.
Selection
Singleton class which represents state where player and level are selected for the game.
SelectionBackButton
Button on the Selection screen.
SelectionCharacterButton
Button on the Selection screen.
SelectionLevelButton
Button on the Selection screen.
SelectionPlayButton
Button on the Selection screen.
ShopRoom
Here the Player can spend coins to buy items.
Spearman
First type of enemies.
SpeedBooster
Upgrades Player's speed.
Stone
Stone.
Updater
Singleton runnable class for updating all game elements.
VictoryScreen
Singleton class which represents a screen shown after player's victory.
VictoryScreenSaveButton
Button on the Victory screen.
